body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Benjamin Martin and the customer's name is Diane Martin.  The conversation is about Baking Bread (a Bakery ) and is a conversation about pricing.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, welcome to Baking Bread! My name is Benjamin Martin and I am here to assist you today.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Diane! How can I assist you with our bakery products today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I was interested in knowing more about your pricing.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Of course, I can help with that! What specific products are you curious about?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm particularly interested in your artisan bread.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great choice! Our artisan bread is priced at five dollars each. May I ask how many loaves you would like to order?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I was thinking about getting three loaves.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Wonderful! That would be a total of fifteen dollars. Could I also have your phone number and your email address to complete the order?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is three zero three, four five six, seven eight nine zero, and my email is diane.martin@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, Diane! Your order for three loaves of artisan bread will be ready soon. Is there anything else you need?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that’s all for now! Thank you for your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're very welcome! Thank you for your time, Diane. Have a great day!
